description:
Blaine lets Magmar live in the Volcano near his hotel on Cinnabar Island.
Blaine calls upon Magmar to battle Ash`s Pikachu which it defeated when Ash quit after Magmar hit Pikachu with a fire blast.
When Jessie, James and Meowth attacked the volcano, Magmar help move rocks to stop the flow of Lava.
After the Volcano was calmed Blaine used Magmar in a second battle against Ash, but this time against his Charizard. After Charizard used its Seismic Toss, Magmar lost the battle.
name: Boober (Katsura)
